content.webTitle: What I like | Guardian Weekend readers' tips

fields.headline: What I like
fields.bodyText: I am head over heels with my hand-knitted Hawk Necklace by A Alicia. And everyone keeps asking where it's from… Ella Owens Doncaster Though more people are reading on electronic devices, you can't beat a properly bound book with a beautifully designed cover. The Folio Society's great selection of wonderfully illustrated modern classics would make fabulous presents for those who still treasure the old-fashioned way of reading. Ralph Webber Carlisle My Favourite Voucher Codes' ethical stance on donating 20% of net commission to charity is a welcome change from most online voucher sites, and lets people vote for their favourite charity while saving money. Paul Wroe Bradford While looking for Mother's Day ideas, I came across Molly's Vintage Tea Party, a website that rents everything you need to hold your own vintage afternoon tea. They even do gorgeous invitations, too. Love it. Jenny Stubbs Retford
